channel.title: Lobbies bugged?
channel.description: It seems lobbies keep getting stuck and not filling. There are plenty of players online it seems but lobbies will get stuck at a certain player amount and not fill.

item.title: Lobbies bugged?
item.dc:creator: BigBenBoulevard
item.description:
But that wouldn’t help much because games with less than 15 plays are no fun

Read full topic

item.title: Lobbies bugged?
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
This issue has been adressed.
In my personal opinion a “force-start” by the host would solve most problems.
However, it’s frustrating i know. when you sit and wait for a full game. However, if you’ve waited 1-10 minutes, i can understand. therefore, implement a force-start? @í42-Xblade

Read full topic

ive found that active chats in lobbies are more likely to get stuck waiting and bug
